item.description:
Since it's a holiday weekend, we should go to Hike @ Heritage Trail Winery!



We will be hiking on a set of trails at the end of the winery that are about 3.5 miles long. Nice set of trails in the woods.

Update:
If you plan on attending PLEASE RSVP and include any others in the count so I can relay an accurate number. We are going to try and limit it to 25 people or so to make it manageable for the restaurant.

We are going to have our third hike in the winery at the Heritage Trail Vineyard in Lisbon, CT.

From Previous hike:
Spoke with the owners and they are dog lovers like us, told us we can hike through the winery and then enjoy lunch and a tasting at their restaurant. They will let us eat at their outside seating. We can NOT eat with our dogs!! Too many. So the dogs will have to be placed in the car. :(

They have an excellent restaurant and excellent wine! Also they have recently acquired a cheese farm and they have different types at their restaurant.

SO please plan on hiking and then enjoying the tasting and/ or some excellent lunch!! BTW their home made Gelato is AMAZING!!

Each person is responsible for their own food/ drink bill.

Website:
http://www.heritagetr...

Directions:
http://maps.google.co...

Menu:
http://www.heritagetr...

Wine List:
http://www.heritagetr...
item.how_to_find_us: Fred and I will be in the parking lot in the back of the buildings.
item.name: July 4th Hike - Wine Tasting Too!
